alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:43PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
